Language.Text:
Day Three.
Luck is on our side. We discovered an abandoned city, where buildings rise up from dark blue water and are connected by ice bridges.
We decided to stay a few days and research ancient technologies and artifacts. Jones started right away. I am worried about Ripley, she inhaled the green slime and got sick, she's changing, she's as if transparent... Hopefully a break will help.

Ice is so slippery that as soon as you start moving across it, stopping or changing direction is impossible.
